title: Everybody and Their Mother!
post_excerpt: Ready to hear the tunes everybody and their mama will love? Open up your listening ears and vibe out to the brilliant cords of Natalie Depergola as she serenades you at Everyone & Their Mother Hip Hop/Jazz Showcase at The Hideaway Cafe in St. Pete Beach....
post_content:
Ready to hear the tunes everybody and their mama will love? Open up your listening ears and vibe out to the brilliant cords of Natalie Depergola as she serenades you at Everyone & Their Mother Hip Hop/Jazz Showcase at The Hideaway Cafe in St. Pete Beach. There’s nothing like a vacation with wonderful music to help you further escape into a land of rhythmic sound. Hideaway Cafe is dedicated to doing just that and is the perfectly unassuming spot to kick back, relax, and enjoy the evening. If you're lucky, you may even get the chance to be apart of history, as many of Hideaway’s events turn into live recordings. Don’t miss out on the chance to witness history in the making at Everyone & Their Mother Hip Hop/Jazz showcase on Saturday, October 14th at 6pm. 

Hideaway Cafe, 1756 Central Ave., Saint Petersburg 33712
